3 Introduction to the Giotto package Ruben Dries & Jiaji George Chen August 5th 2024 3.1 Presentation Figure 3.1: Giotto Suite slides 3.2 Ecosystem Giotto Suite is a modular ecosystem of individual R packages that each provide different functionality and that together provide users with a fully integrated spatial multi-omics workflow. Each package also has its own website: - GiottoUtils: https://drieslab.github.io/GiottoUtils/ - GiottoClass: https://drieslab.github.io/GiottoClass/ - GiottoData: https://drieslab.github.io/GiottoData/ - GiottoVisuals: https://drieslab.github.io/GiottoVisuals/ More information is available at https://drieslab.github.io/Giotto_website/articles/ecosystem.html 3.3 Installation + python environment 3.4 Giotto instructions
